summary: SummaryHighlightsVeganGive BackMaybelline Fit Me Loose Finishing Powder is the perfect finishing touch to your makeup. Mineral-based formula control shine and smooth skin's texture.
details: DetailsBenefitsSets foundation for 12 hours, while softening the look of imperfectionsProvides a sheer hint of color that stays true throughout wearLightweight, breathable coverage with a natural, shine-free finishFeaturesDermatologist testedAllergy tested and suitable for sensitive skinItem 2510255How To UseApply with a brush. Swirl brush into powder, tap excess and lightly dust over face. Can be used alone or on top of makeup.IngredientsTalc, Dimethicone, Silica. May Contain: CI 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 / Iron Oxides.
how_to_use: Apply with a brush. Swirl brush into powder, tap excess and lightly dust over face. Can be used alone or on top of makeup.

reviews.headline: Great coverage
reviews.comments: Always have one in my kit. Works perfectly to blend contour

reviews.headline: Best powder drugstore powder I've ever used
reviews.comments: This powder has helped me a lot throughout my whole makeup routine and it just leaves me base very very smooth. I would most definitely recommend this powder a lot it's literally my holy grail ‚ò∫Ô∏è‚ò∫Ô∏è

reviews.headline: Survived 12 hours
reviews.comments: I was sceptical about this product since the brand is a hit or miss, but this was just amazing! I put it on at around 7am to go out to the farmer's market (dont judge) and it stayed after a family function and THREE hours in the sun at a carnival (three rides and direct sunlight later). It stayed so well, didn't cake, and it covered my fine lines and blemishes so well i was asked for my skincare routine!

reviews.headline: it's alright
reviews.comments: I used to use this powder for years it was the one powder I would always go back to but recently whenever j use it it always would make my.makeup break up after an hour idk if anyone has had the same issue

reviews.headline: My Holy Grail
reviews.comments: This is one of the best powders ive ever used. Ive used almost every high end and drugstore loose powder, and this one is by far the best, especially, for the price! It controls shine, blurs, doesnt cling to dry patches,etc. Ive gone searching for loose powders on the high end scale, and i just havent liked any of them as much as this! Also, the pressed version of the fit me powder is perfect for touchups!!

reviews.headline: My Holy Grail
reviews.comments: This is one of the best powders ive ever used. Ive used almost every high end and drugstore loose powder, and this one is by far the best, especially, for the price! It controls shine, blurs, doesnt cling to dry patches,etc. Ive gone searching for loose powders on the high end scale, and i just havent liked any of them as much as this! Also, the pressed version of the fit me powder is perfect for touchups!!

reviews.headline: Color range is garbage
reviews.comments: I have light/medium olive skin and the light/'medium shade is pretty dark. I opted for the light shade and its still slightly dark, but besides that it has a different tone so my face doesnt match my neck when i use this. I couldnt get the shade before that because itll leave me insane white cast. So disappointing because the powder itself is pretty good

reviews.headline: SO GOOD!!
reviews.comments: Okay so I didnt have high hopes for this tbh but now im so happy I got this product. This powder does a REALLY good job at making my makeup stay in place for the whole day which tbh with idk if its supposed to do that?? I have used the pressed powder version of this and this powder for sure does a better job at not making my makeup not disapear and stay in place! Brighteneing wise its also pretty good but I dont really see much coverage with this which is fine for me.

reviews.headline: Best losse powder!
reviews.comments: Recommend if your under eyes crease, this will do the job!

reviews.headline: I would buy again
reviews.comments: Love this product works great leaves my face and under eyes flawless last all day would definitely buy again and is very affordable and comes with a lot of product would recommend this to everyone I give it a 10 blends well with other powders and bronzer

reviews.headline: Amazing powder
reviews.comments: This setting powder is fabulous! Especially for fair skin girlies that need a touch of color when setting concealar that isnt going to make it darker or grey.

reviews.headline: Been using it for years
reviews.comments: I've been using this for years and have purchased multiple times. It's great for setting make up and feels like nothing is even there. I have skin on the oily side so this helps me set my makeup.

reviews.headline: Holy Grail Setting Powder
reviews.comments: I've used this setting powder since high school and I LOVE IT!! Makes your make-up last all day. The only downside is frankly the shade range.

reviews.headline: Best affordable powder üíØ
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this powder! I first bought it when I was getting into makeup and I immediately fell in love with it. It leaves a smooth base, doesnt cling on to dry patches, and it's so blurring! üòç I will continue to repurchase this powder and it's so long lasting, im barley on my second one and its been two years! (I do use this pretty often)

While this product does blur, (at first), it quickly settles into creases and has an AWFUL shade range. I don't think it's worth a single dollar. I wish it didn't settle into creases so badly. It also feels SO heavy.

reviews.headline: my fav loose setting powder
reviews.comments: It's a great setting powder, especially for us with oily skin. Make sure to choose your right shade because its really pigmented

reviews.headline: 2nd Purchase, Solid, Affordable Choice
reviews.comments: Lightweight formula which doesn't get muddy on my oily skin. It also doesn't cause any heat buildup or sensitivity. I use both Fair and Fair-Light. It's affordable, non-scented, non-occlusive, and very natural when applied with a light hand. I set everything with Charlotte Tilbury and the look is premium, and ultra-lux. 10/10 highly recommend.

reviews.headline: wanted to love it
reviews.comments: i was looking to try some affordable loss powders, it went great the first two days, granted not enough for my super oily skin, but still decent, until it completely broke me out. once i stopped using it my skin cleared up, if you have acne prone skin please listen to these reviews because I did not.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: amazingüíñ

reviews.headline: THE BEST
reviews.comments: This is by far the best loose setting powder out there!!! Instantly mattifies and smooths without making my base makeup look cakey or dry. My holy grail!!

media.headline: Dark Skin Friendly And Not Ashy
media.caption: Fit Me Loose Finishing Powder in 40 Dark

media.headline: Dark Skin Friendly And Not Ashy
media.caption: Fit Me Loose Finishing Powder in 40 Dark

faceoff_positive.comments: It's about time Maybelline made a loose powder for dark skin. I purchased the shade in 40-Dark as soon as it was stocked at my favorite retailer. It came safety sealed. :) I was so pleased with the product. I have dark skin that is very ruddy (red) and most drugstore products are too yellow for me. This powder is perfect for my complexion and it's not too yellow for me and it's a matte finish. The powder is really finely milled/ jet milled. The powder did not change the color of my foundation and it does settle in without looking powdery or ashy. A little goes a long way. Maybelline has come a long way in what they offer to women like me. I love the packaging. It's easy to open and the cap screws to a tight close. I don't have to worry about spilling product or making a mess. I would suggest that there should be a shade of powder added for Ebony skin. There could be a #45 and a #50 for super dark skin.
faceoff_positive.headline: Dark Skin Friendly And Not Ashy

faceoff_negative.comments: *DISCLAIMER: I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.* I am a big fan of Maybelline products, so I was really excited to try out the FIT ME! Loose Finishing Powder. I received the shade "15-Light" and right off the bat I thought it looked too dark for me fair to light skin tone, but once I applied it over my liquid foundation, it blended nicely with my skin and looked like a pretty good match. It's definitely not translucent, so it does leave a tint/light wash of color. It set my makeup nicely in the beginning, but began to deteriorate throughout the day. Definitely not long wearing.
